snippet: Golf Digest’s May issue features Paulina Gretzky, the daughter of the hockey great Wayne Gretzky, a decision that has frustrated some golfers on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
abstract: Paulina Gretzky, daughter of hockey great Wayne Gretzky, is featured on May cover of Golf Digest; her main connection to golf is fiancee Dustin Johnson, eight-time winner on the PGA Tour; decision feature her has vexed some golfers on the LPGA Tour.
lead_paragraph: Golf Digest’s May issue features Paulina Gretzky, the daughter of the hockey great Wayne Gretzky, a decision that has frustrated some golfers on the L.P.G.A. Tour.

headline.main: Golf Digest’s Cover Spurs Criticism From L.P.G.A. Pros
headline.print_headline: Golf Digest’s Cover Spurs Criticism From L.P.G.A. Pros
